ext_description.message: Send NZB links to SABnzbd for download.

page_action_title.message: SABdrop found NZBs on this page

page_action_message.message: SABdrop found NZBs on this page. Click on one to send it to your SABnzbd.
page_action_message.description: Text that is displayed in head of page action popup

options_setting_host_help.message: URL to SABnzbd, optionally with port. For example: http://localhost/sabnzbd/ or http://192.168.80.1:8080/

options_setting_apikey_help.message: API key can be found in the SABnzbd settings

options_setting_popuphide_help.message: After how many milliseconds should the popup disappear? Use 0 to disable popups completely.
